TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: I am devastated by the loss of each one of you I was too foolish to protect. But I promise, I will do all I can to protect your friends... Rest well in this faith.

CASSAVA: Soon, it will be safe to roam and explore this beautiful planet, and look into the sky of stars with your four eyes again... I could never rest well, leaving your adventurous spirits confined underwater.
CASSAVA: Someday, your species may even someday explore even beyond this planet. Perhaps you may even discover the ruins, stories, and many discoveries my clan has made.
CASSAVA: But to allow that possibility to ever take form, I must first take my leave from this world.
CASSAVA: Do not weep for the past. Look to the present and the future... and be curious on your journey.
